applicant-name.name: ANHUI SHENGSHUI NEW ENERGY TECH CO LTD
安徽枡水新能源科技有限公司

invention-title: PEM single-channel pure water electrolysis hydrogen production high-pressure testing device
一种PEM单通道电解纯水制氢高压测试装置

abstract.p: The invention provides a PEM single-channel pure water electrolysis hydrogen production high-pressure testing device which comprises an equipment box and an electrolysis box arranged on the upper right portion of the equipment box, a circulating liquid tank is arranged in the equipment box, and water is pumped into the circulating liquid tank from a pure water tank through a liquid supply pump; a manual ball valve, a circulating liquid tank water inlet electromagnetic valve, a second clamping sleeve tee joint, a liquid supply pump, a clamping sleeve check valve and a circulating liquid tank are arranged on the path; electrolytic pure water is contained in the circulating liquid tank, the electrolytic bath is arranged at the bottom of the electrolytic tank, the electrolytic pure water in the circulating liquid tank is pumped into the electrolytic bath through the liquid inlet pipeline by the magnetic drive pump, and current and voltage are given through the direct-current power source to carry out an electrolytic experiment. The device has the following beneficial effects that the automatic back pressure valve is additionally arranged in the pipeline to which the cathode outlet of the electrolytic cell belongs, the cathode high-pressure gas-liquid separator, the mechanical pressure gauge and other devices are used for performing pressure building on hydrogen generated on the cathode side through the automatic back pressure valve to reach an ideal pressure value, and therefore the requirement for the cathode and anode pressure difference is met.

本发明提供一种PEM单通道电解纯水制氢高压测试装置，包括设备箱以及设置在设备箱右上方的电解箱，设备箱内部布置有循环液罐，由供液泵从纯水箱里面抽水到循环液罐内，其路径上设有手动球阀、循环液罐进水电磁阀、第二卡套三通、供液泵、卡套止回阀、循环液罐；循环液罐内具有电解纯水，电解槽布置在所述电解箱的底部，由磁驱泵将循环液罐内的电解纯水通过进液管道打到电解槽内，通过直流电源给定电流电压进行电解实验，与现有技术相比，本发明具有如下的有益效果：在电解槽阴极出口所属管路中增加自动背压阀、阴极高压气液分离器、机械压表等装置将阴极侧产生的氢气通过自动背压阀进行憋压达到理想压力值，由此来满足阴阳极压差的需求。
